Title: I Bring Us Great Shame
Description:
I have failed my fellow brewers.

I took some supplies out to the clearing, east of our tree... and I left them there. Now, with the sha corrupting the land, and the mantid on the prowl, it is too dangerous for me to bring them back.

If you would help me look for them, perhaps I could regain some of my lost honor.
ObjectivesText: Find the Lost Keg, the Lost Mugs, and the Lost Picnic Supplies.
CompletionText: Did you find them? Can it be?
RewardText: You have brought me joy, traveler.
